AI-powered summarization for web pages and YouTube videos. Free ChatGPT integration with optional API support.

Version 1.0.0 ‚Ä¢ Multi-Browser

‚ú® Features

üåê

Free ChatGPT Web

Opens ChatGPT.com in background and extracts AI responses automatically. No API key needed!

üîë

Optional API Support

Add OpenAI, Anthropic (Claude), or Google Gemini API keys for direct integration.

üì¶

Smart Chunking

Automatically splits large content (3000+ tokens) into manageable chunks for processing.

üé•

YouTube Transcripts

Extracts and summarizes YouTube video transcripts with timestamps.

üîí

Privacy-First

All settings stored locally. No tracking, no external data collection.

‚ö°

One-Click Summaries

Click extension icon to instantly generate AI summaries of any page.

Build Instructions

üìñ Installation Instructions

Chrome Installation

  1. Download from the Chrome card above
  2. Unzip web-summary-ai-v1.0.0.zip
  3. Extract the build folder
  4. Open Chrome and go to chrome://extensions/
  5. Enable "Developer mode" (toggle in top right)
  6. Click "Load unpacked" button
  7. Select the extracted build folder
  8. Extension will appear in your toolbar!
Note: First time use requires logging in to ChatGPT.com. The extension will prompt you if needed.

Firefox Installation

  1. Download from the Firefox card above
  2. Open Firefox and go to about:addons
  3. Click the gear icon (‚öôÔ∏è) ‚Üí "Install Add-on From File..."
  4. Select web-summary-ai-v1.0.0.xpi
  5. Click "Add" when prompted
  6. Extension will appear in your toolbar!
Note: Sign in to ChatGPT.com before first use for best experience.

Edge Installation

  1. Download from the Edge card above
  2. Unzip web-summary-ai-v1.0.0.zip
  3. Extract the build folder
  4. Open Edge and go to edge://extensions/
  5. Enable "Developer mode" (toggle in left sidebar)
  6. Click "Load unpacked" button
  7. Select the extracted build folder
  8. Extension will appear in your toolbar!
Note: Log in to ChatGPT.com first for automatic AI summaries.

Safari Installation (macOS)

  1. Download from the Safari card above
  2. Unzip web-summary-ai-v1.0.0.zip
  3. Open the source folder in Xcode
  4. Create new "Safari Web Extension" project
  5. Copy extension files to the project
  6. Build and run from Xcode (‚åò+R)
  7. In Safari: Preferences ‚Üí Extensions ‚Üí Enable "Web Summary AI"
Note: Safari extensions require macOS development setup. Requires ChatGPT login for AI features.
